list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (in Greek and Roman mythology) each of nine goddesses, the daughters of Zeus and Mnemosyne, who preside over the arts and sciences.
a person or personified force who is the source of inspiration for a creative artist.

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an instance or period of reflection.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he was musing on the problems he faced
